scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.dist: npm run node && npm run web && npm run web-es5
scripts.node: shx rm -rf dist && cross-env NODE_ENV=production tsc
scripts.web: shx rm -rf web && cross-env NODE_ENV=production webpack
scripts.web-es5: shx rm -rf web-es5 && cross-env NODE_ENV=production webpack --config webpack.config.es5.js
scripts.lint: npm run eslint && npm run tslint
scripts.test: npm run test-node && npm run test-web-es2015 && npm run test-electron && npm run test-nwjs
scripts.test-win: npm run test && npm run test-web-es5
scripts.test-cli: npm run test-node && npm run test-web-headless
scripts.test-web-headless: cross-env NODE_ENV=test NO_DETECT=1 karma start --single-run --browsers ChromeHeadless
scripts.test-web-es5: cross-env NODE_ENV=test NO_DETECT=1 karma start --single-run --browsers IE karma.conf.es5.js
scripts.docdist: cd doc && git clean -fd && git rm -rf * && cd .. && npm run doc && cd doc && touch .nojekyll && git add . && git commit -m doc && git push
scripts.doc: typedoc --mode file --out doc --disableOutputCheck --excludeNotExported lib && cd doc && git status && cd ..
